```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)

```


```{r}
#reading in the data
water <- read_csv(here("data", "Water_Districts.csv"))
```

Fitting a line
```{r}
model.kern <- lm(MC_Kern ~ 0 + Reduction, data = water)
```

Getting the Slope
```{r}
B <- model.kern$coefficient[1]
```
